title: As soon as i win promos and make bronze i pretty much end up going straight back down
body: How do i make it up bronze 4? It's ridiculous i pretty much go straight to b4 then straight back to b5 the whole season. wondering if you just get tilted as people at the bottom of b4?

replies.body: just have to grind it man was b5 3 days ago m up to high b3 now just learn an op champ and play nothing but them im using swain mid to carry me up and out of bronze
